local_intent: Orient TCP to 90° while positioned above the green bin lid to prepare precise approach.
assumptions: Bin pose is known and reachable
Yaw 90° aligns with the lid hinge/edge for subsequent approach
coherence_with_global: Replicates the global step order around the approach phase: ensure visibility, move above lid (0.05 m), set yaw to 90°, then verify orientation before later alignment.
